content: when 4 you come to it 1 stitch decreased = 72 stitches foot rounds 1-36 repeat rounds 3-8 from leg portion 6 times using mc and cc2 cc3 cc1 cc2 cc3 cc1 respectively rounds 37-38 repeat rounds 6 and 7 from leg portion using mc and cc2 round 39 k2 with mc k1 with cc2 12 times across 36 stitches place marker you now have the bor marker and the halfway marker dividing the top toe stitches from the bottom toe stitches toe round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 slip marker k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k1 slip bor marker 4 stitches decreased round 2 knit to end of round rounds 3-18 repeat rounds 1 and 2 round 19 repeat round 1 there should be 16 stitches between each marker slide first 16 stitches onto a size 1 2 25 mm dpn or circular needle leave the remaining 16 stitches on the current needle use kitchener stitch to graft the heel closed *this pattern has not been tech edited or test knitted for any questions clarifications or issues please send an email to thekniterarymaven@gmail com thank you -isabel 5
